root.name: EverQuest II: Chains of Eternity
root.description: The ninth expansion to EverQuest II, following EverQuest II: Age of Discovery.New features include:Level cap increase to 95 for combat, crafting, and guilds.Two new Ethernere overland areas.Nine new instanced dungeonsNew prestige abilitiesA new adornment typeNew quests and items
